title: Brooklyn DA Shifts Weight Away From Low-Level Marijuana Cases
teaser: Kenneth Thompson, the district attorney of Brooklyn, has announced that his office will not prosecute most low-level marijuana cases because, he says, "we are pouring money into an endeavor that produces no public safety benefit." Melissa Block talks to Thompson for more.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
